title: Specialised Facials
description: At Dr. Sadia’s Advanced Aesthetic & Laser Center, our Specialised Facials are designed to address specific skin concerns with clinical precision and luxury care. Each treatment combines advanced techniques with carefully selected serums and technology to deliver visible, long-lasting results. Whether you’re targeting acne, dullness, pigmentation, or signs of aging — we have a facial that’s right for you.
highlights: Customised for different skin types and concerns
Safe, non-invasive, and with minimal to no downtime
Suitable for both men and women

services.title: Medicated HydraFacial
services.description: A deep-cleansing facial with medicated serums that hydrate, soothe, and treat acne-prone or sensitive skin.

services.title: BB Glow Facial
services.description: Gives a semi-permanent glowing effect using BB serum, reducing pigmentation and brightening the skin instantly.

services.title: Anti-Acne Treatment Facial
services.description: Targets breakouts, clears pores, and reduces oiliness to reveal visibly clearer, healthier skin.

services.title: Special Whitening Facial
services.description: Brightens dull skin and evens out tone, reducing pigmentation and sun damage for a radiant look.

services.title: Carbon Facial
services.description: A laser-based facial that deeply cleanses, shrinks pores, and delivers an instant glow with no downtime.

services.title: Vampire Facial
services.description: Uses your own PRP to boost collagen, improve texture, and restore youthful firmness and glow.

services.title: HydraFacial with Microabrasion & UV Light
services.description: Combines exfoliation, hydration, and UV therapy for cleaner, brighter, and bacteria-free skin.

services.title: PRP Face with Vampire Facial
services.description: A powerful blend of PRP and microneedling that rejuvenates skin, reduces signs of aging, and adds firmness.

title: Skin Rejuvenation
description: Our Skin Rejuvenation treatments are designed to restore, renew, and refresh your skin from deep within. Using scientifically proven techniques and dermatological expertise, we help reverse signs of aging, reduce imperfections, and improve overall skin health. Whether you’re looking to achieve a youthful glow or correct specific concerns, our advanced therapies offer real results.
highlights: Reduces fine lines, scars, and pigmentation
Enhances natural radiance with minimal downtime

services.title: Chemical Peels
services.description: A controlled exfoliation treatment that removes dead skin layers, improves tone, and reduces blemishes and pigmentation.

services.title: PRP Face
services.description: Uses your own platelet-rich plasma to boost skin regeneration, improve texture, and promote a youthful glow.

services.title: Microneedling
services.description: Tiny needles create micro-injuries to stimulate collagen production, reducing scars, fine lines, and dullness.

services.title: Dermaplaning
services.description: A gentle exfoliation technique that removes peach fuzz and dead skin cells, leaving your face ultra-smooth and bright.

services.title: Microabrasion
services.description: Deeply exfoliates the skin’s surface to improve tone and texture, refine pores, and boost cell turnover.

title: Anti-Aging Treatments
description: Our Anti-Aging Treatments are designed to preserve youthfulness and restore skin’s firmness, smoothness, and vitality. Using global gold-standard techniques, we focus on non-surgical solutions that deliver visible results with precision and safety. Whether it’s lifting, tightening, wrinkle reduction, or restoring lost volume, we offer personalized care to meet your unique needs.
highlights: Targets wrinkles, sagging, and volume loss

services.title: HIFU
services.description: High-Intensity Focused Ultrasound tightens and lifts sagging skin by stimulating deep collagen production — without needles or downtime.

services.title: Botox
services.description: Temporarily relaxes facial muscles to smooth dynamic wrinkles, such as forehead lines and crow’s feet, for a youthful appearance.

services.title: Dermal Filler
services.description: Restores lost volume in cheeks, lips, and under eyes while contouring facial features for a refreshed, balanced look.

services.title: Thread Lift
services.description: A minimally invasive lifting technique using dissolvable threads to tighten sagging skin and improve facial structure.

services.title: Mesotherapy
services.description: A cocktail of vitamins, enzymes, and peptides injected into the skin to improve elasticity, hydration, and glow.

services.title: Mesotherapy Under Eye for Wrinkle Reduction
services.description: Targets fine lines, dark circles, and puffiness under the eyes, rejuvenating the delicate area with micro-injections of nourishing serums.

title: Aesthetic Care
description: Our Aesthetic Care services focus on enhancing natural beauty through precision-based, non-invasive treatments tailored to each individual. From skin tone correction to long-term skincare guidance, we provide advanced solutions that blend science and artistry — all under expert supervision.
highlights: Holistic approach to facial harmony and skin health
Combines medical aesthetics with luxury care
Ongoing support through follow-ups and monitoring

services.title: Personalized Facial Aesthetics
services.description: Customized treatments designed to enhance facial balance, improve symmetry, and highlight natural features with precision.

services.title: Non-Surgical Rejuvenation
services.description: Combines modern techniques like Botox, fillers, and threads to restore youthfulness without surgery or downtime.

services.title: Advanced Skincare Solutions
services.description: Medical-grade skincare regimens and in-clinic treatments to correct issues like acne, pigmentation, and aging signs.

services.title: Skin Brightening Treatments
services.description: Targets dull, uneven skin tone and pigmentation with powerful brightening agents to restore a radiant, healthy glow.

services.title: Consultation & Follow-up Care
services.description: One-on-one expert consultations and continuous monitoring to ensure safe progress, optimal results, and client satisfaction.

title: Fat Reduction
description: Our Fat Reduction treatments are non-surgical, targeted, and effective, helping clients achieve a more sculpted and toned look without the risks or recovery time of surgery. With advanced technologies like HIFU and contouring protocols, we focus on stubborn fat areas while ensuring skin firmness and safety.
highlights: No cuts, no downtime, long-lasting results
Targets specific problem areas like the abdomen & chin
Enhances body contour and tightens skin
Suitable for both men and women

services.title: Body Fat Reduction (Without HIFU)
services.description: A non-HIFU method using medical protocols to break down stubborn fat layers, improving body contour naturally over time.

services.title: Body Fat Reduction (With HIFU)
services.description: Combining high-intensity ultrasound to penetrate deep fat layers, breaking them down and tightening skin for a slimmer shape.

services.title: Double Chin Fat Reduction
services.description: Targets and reduces excess fat under the chin, refining jawline definition and enhancing overall facial profile — non-surgically.

title: LASER Treatments
description: Our advanced laser treatments offer effective, safe, and permanent solutions for unwanted hair removal. Using state-of-the-art laser technology, we target hair follicles precisely to reduce and prevent hair growth, giving you smooth, clear skin with minimal discomfort and no downtime.
highlights: Permanent hair reduction with precision lasers
Suitable for sensitive and small areas

services.title: Permanent Hair Removal (Upper Lip Area)
services.description: Targets unwanted hair on the upper lip for a smooth, hair-free look without irritation, ideal for sensitive facial skin.

services.title: Chin Area
services.description: Effectively reduces hair growth on the chin, enhancing your natural contours and reducing the need for regular shaving or waxing.

services.title: Cheek Area
services.description: Gentle yet powerful treatment for the cheeks to remove fine, unwanted hair and brighten facial appearance.

services.title: Full Face Combo
services.description: Comprehensive laser hair removal covering upper lip, chin, cheeks, and other facial areas for complete, lasting smoothness.

title: Pigmentation Reduction
description: Our pigmentation reduction treatments are designed to gently and effectively lighten dark spots and uneven skin tones, restoring a brighter, more uniform complexion. Using advanced technologies and targeted protocols, we focus on problem areas while ensuring skin health and safety.
highlights: Targets stubborn dark spots and uneven tones

services.title: Dark Eye or Under Eye Pigmentation Reduction
services.description: Specifically targets dark circles and pigmentation under the eyes, reducing discoloration and revitalizing the delicate skin for a fresher, well-rested look.

services.title: Lip Depigmentation or Rosy Lips
services.description: Lightens uneven pigmentation on the lips and enhances natural lip color, creating a soft, rosy, and youthful appearance.

title: Pico Laser
description: Pico Laser is an advanced laser treatment that targets pigmentation, acne scars, and skin rejuvenation with ultra-short laser pulses. It provides faster results with minimal downtime and is safe for all skin types.
highlights: Removes pigmentation, melasma, and freckles effectively
Stimulates collagen for smoother, firmer skin
Safe for all skin tones and types

services.title: Pigmentation Removal
services.description: Targets and breaks down excess pigmentation like sunspots and melasma, revealing clearer, more even-toned skin.

services.title: Acne Scar Reduction
services.description: Stimulates collagen to improve acne scars and skin texture, helping you achieve smoother skin without harsh downtime.

services.title: Skin Rejuvenation
services.description: Boosts overall skin clarity and tone by revitalizing the skin from within through ultra-fast laser energy pulses.

title: Other Services
description: We offer a range of safe, professional skin and piercing services designed to enhance your appearance and comfort. Our expert team uses precise, hygienic techniques ensuring effective results with minimal discomfort.
highlights: Safe, sterile procedures are performed by experienced professionals
Suitable for sensitive skin and delicate areas
Services are available for both men and women

services.title: Mole, Skin Wart, Skin Tag Removal
services.description: Gentle and effective removal of moles, warts, and skin tags using medical-grade treatments to restore smooth, healthy skin with minimal scarring.

services.title: Medicated Piercing, Ear Piercing, Nose Piercing
services.description: Professional piercing services using medicated tools and sterile techniques to ensure safe, precise, and hygienic ear and nose piercings with expert aftercare.
